com.citytechinc.aem.bedrock.api.request

Interface ComponentRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentResourceRequest, ComponentServletRequest

    public interface ComponentRequest
extends ComponentServletRequest
    Request facade for use in CQ component beans. Wraps all relevant objects from the current request context and provides additional convenience methods for accessing content.
